description:
On this talk you'll learn the principles for parallel automation testing using pytest, appium server and selenium automation android drivers with a simple and interesting example using the Android calculator app.

Ponente: Javier Gutierrez:

Sigue a PyLatam en:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PyLatam
Sitio oficial: https://pylatam.org/
title: Introduction to Parallel Mobile Automation Testing with Pytest, Appium, Selenium
